How to install:
1. Run Boonka_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

Once upon a time, flora and trees covered the peaceful countryside of a distant and beautiful world. To restore this once idyllic land to its former glory, you'll need to subdivide into various little nature spirits called Boonkas and work to heal the land. Boonka includes 3 different game modes designed for every kind of player. Restore the land to its once tranquil way of life in Adventure Mode, put your reflexes to the test in Blitz Mode, or take your time playing Beanstalk Mode. With over 60 fast-paced levels, 15 powerful, level-changing power-ups and bonuses, and truly addictive gameplay, Boonka has something for everyone!
